name: natures-madness
effect: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.
short_effect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.
